statements: DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE battery_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM battery_storage WHERE location = 'New York' AND capacity > 1000;
DELETE FROM charging_station WHERE max_power > 100 AND status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM battery_data WHERE battery_id = 101 AND battery_level < 20;
DELETE FROM energy_usage WHERE battery_id = 201 AND energy_consumed > 50;
DELETE FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_region = 'North' AND production_amount < 1000
DELETE FROM BatteryPerformance WHERE battery_id = 2 AND charge_rate > 0.5
DELETE FROM battery_performance WHERE performance_metric = 'efficiency' AND value < 0.8;
DELETE FROM energy_production WHERE production_value > 1000 AND date = '2023-07-15';
